mapper.select: SELECT a.room_no, a.room_name, a.mem_id, b.mem_nick, a.reg_date, a.del_yn, a.part_mem FROM rooms a JOIN members b ON a.mem_id = b.mem_id WHERE a.mem_id = #{memId} OR a.part_mem = #{memId} ORDER BY 1 DESC
